content: this pattern is also available for free on my website here 1 learn how to slip_stitch in the back loop only and work up a fun crochet dishcloth this pattern was inspired by all of the classic knit dishcloths from my grandmother-in-law which i love more than some of my own dishcloth patterns i admit it i use dishcloths constantly to wipe toddler hands and the kitchen table after meals my favorites have nice drape and some texture to really get those little hands clean many of my favorites are garter knits so i set out to design a crochet dishcloth with a similar texture and drape i hope you enjoy this pattern abbreviations us blo back loop only chain s chain s slip_stitch s slip_stitch es st s stitches materials plymouth yarns fantasy naturale weight 4 medium 100% mercerized cotton 140yds/128m 3 5oz/100g color 9420 1 skein j/10 6mm crochet hook scissors tapestry needle skill level easy finished size 6 x 6 before blocking/washing 5 x 6 5 after blocking/washing 5 x 8 5 when wet gauge 17 sts x 25 row = 4″ x 4″ before blocking you can watch a video tutorial on my youtube channel here https //youtu be/q_jmediwiuq 1 https //dananield com/slip-stitch-dishcloth/
